title: BALI: Branch-Aware Loop Invariant Inference with Large Language Models
summary: Loop invariants are fundamental for reasoning about the correctness of iterative algorithms. However, deriving suitable invariants remains a challenging and often manual task, particularly for complex programs. In this paper, we introduce BALI, a branch-aware framework that integrates large language models (LLMs) to enhance the inference and verification of loop invariants.
